description:
This BRAND NEW COURSE was designed in June 2015 with the absolute beginner in mind. Whether you know nothing about computers, or you simply want to reinforce the knowledge you already have, I'll help you achieve your goals.

Even if you've never used a Windows computer, this course will guide you step-by-step to computer confidence. I'll lead you slowly through each topic, cover everything you need to know to feel comfortable, and I promise to avoid confusing computer jargon.

Updated July 1 2015!!!

Register now and get access for life!! If you ever need to review any part of this course, you can repeat each lecture as many times as you want.

Best of all, you get 30 days to decide if I've kept my promise. If within 30 days, you're dissatisfied for any reason, I'll gladly refund your tuition, no questions asked!!!

I've been working in the computer industry for over 30 years and I've helped thousands of people just like you learn to use their computer more efficiently and without frustration. I'm completely confident I can help you as well.

In this course, you'll learn the following:

  • The five characteristics that all computers share?
  • How to use a standard keyboard.
  • How to use a standard mouse.
  • Become fluent with the Windows desktop.
  • Learn to customize and configure your Windows environment.
  • Learn how to use your computer for banking, shopping, and many common office functions.
  • Learn how to find information and answers about any subject quickly and easily.
  • Learn how to share your computer with other family members without your settings getting changed.
  • Learn how to keep your computer free of viruses and other malicious software.
  • Learn how to do all the above securely and at minimal risk.

I'm constantly working for you by adding new lectures and material to this course. As a registered student, you'll be the first to have access to new material and you'll never need to pay one penny more. You have my personal guarantee.
title: Beginning Windows: From Novice To Power User!!
